translated: The Chapter about the Giver of the World
at the foot of the Fortunate One’s Bodhi Tree,
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of planting.
It was surely a good thing for me,
the Fortunate One’s instruction has been accomplished.
the Fortunate One’s instruction has been accomplished.”🔽Thus the elder Sīhāsanabījiya recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā sīhāsanabījiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Sīhāsanabījiyattherassāpadānaṁ tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā sīhāsanabījiyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽sīhāsanabījiya therassa apadānam
translated: The Elder Sīhāsanabījiya’s Story, the third.
